example.text: This bill: ? ? tears down the asylum system ? ? fails to create pathways to legal migration/citizenship ? ? diverts resources from ports of entry where most victims, drugs & contraband are trafficked ? ? hurts nonprofits' (like the San Diego Rapid Response Network) ability to help

Organizations in San Diego provide temporary housing, meals, and travel arrangements for asylum seekers. They need additional resources to handle arrivals. We must support border organizations & local govts. that help migrant communities as we fix our broken immigration system.
